full_description:
Wavefun Wave 50 Rugged Smart Watch

The Wavefun Wave 50 is a rugged smartwatch designed for outdoor use. It features a 1.83-inch HD full touch screen made of high-quality aluminum alloy and tempered glass, meeting military-grade standards for durability. The watch is resistant to heat, cold, dust, moisture, and salt spray. With its bright and clear display, the Wave 50 offers a textured viewing experience. Wavefun Wave 50 Rugged Smart Watch supports making and answering calls, playing music, and receiving notifications from various social media platforms. It has 123 built-in sports modes and can automatically detect and record training data. The Wavefun Wave 50 smartwatch is IP68 waterproof, making it suitable for activities such as handwashing and running in the rain. It also offers health monitoring features like heart rate, blood pressure, blood oxygen, and sleep tracking. The Wavefun Wave 50 Rugged Smart Watch has a long battery life and supports convenient functions such as a calculator, voice assistant, game mode, weather updates, alarm clock, remote camera control, sedentary reminder, stopwatch, and customizable watch faces.
